column5: A beautiful 3/2 home 10 minutes from sea world and fiesta Texas . 30 min from Lackland AFB Great location also close to the river walk.You can feel right at home while you are vacationing in this beautiful city. Kitchen has granite countertops.Bathroom offer garden tub/shower. All bedroom have ceiling fan. Privacy and covered back porch. This home has everything you need to spend a nice romantic get away vacation in San Antonio. Requires 2 minimum night stay
